metadata.name: quickpick
metadata.description: Quick Pick Express - High-frequency 5/35 lottery on Solana

instructions.name: add_reserve_funds
docs: Adds additional reserve funds for jackpot seeding or emergencies.
Only the lottery authority can add funds.
* `amount` - Amount of USDC lamports to add

accounts.name: lottery_state
docs: The main lottery state (to verify authority)

accounts.name: authority_usdc
docs: Authority's USDC token account (source of funds)

instructions.name: buy_ticket
docs: Buy a Quick Pick Express ticket
Purchases a ticket with 5 selected numbers from 1-35.
Requires $50 lifetime spend in the main lottery ($50 gate).
USDC is transferred from player to prize pool, house fee, and insurance accounts.

accounts.name: ticket
docs: The ticket account to be created

accounts.name: user_stats
docs: This account is owned by the main lottery program, NOT this program.
We use UncheckedAccount + manual validation because Anchor's #[account]
derives PDAs under the current program ID, but this PDA lives under the
PDA derivation verified, discriminator checked, total_spent >= gate

instructions.name: cancel_draw
docs: Cancels the current draw in progress, resetting the state
so a new draw can be initiated. Used for stuck draws or issues.
Only the lottery authority can cancel.

accounts.name: lottery_state
docs: The main lottery state (to verify authority)

instructions.name: claim_prize
docs: Claim prize for a winning Quick Pick ticket
Calculates match count against winning numbers and
transfers the appropriate prize from the prize pool.
Anyone can claim their own winning ticket.

accounts.name: player
docs: The player claiming the prize (must be ticket owner)

accounts.name: draw_result
docs: The draw result for the ticket's draw

accounts.name: player_usdc
docs: Player's USDC token account (to receive prize)

instructions.name: commit_randomness
docs: Commit to randomness for the upcoming Quick Pick draw
This is the COMMIT phase of the commit-reveal pattern.
Stores the randomness account reference for the reveal phase.
Only the lottery authority can commit.

accounts.name: lottery_state
docs: The main lottery state (to verify authority)

instructions.name: emergency_fund_transfer
docs: Allows emergency transfer of funds between pools.
Quick Pick must be paused. Only for emergencies.
Only the lottery authority can execute.
* `source` - Source of funds (Reserve, Insurance, or PrizePool)

accounts.name: lottery_state
docs: The main lottery state (to verify authority)

instructions.name: execute_draw
docs: Execute the Quick Pick draw by revealing randomness
This is the REVEAL phase of the commit-reveal pattern.
Retrieves randomness from Switchboard and generates 5 winning numbers.
Determines if rolldown triggers (probabilistic between soft/hard caps).
Only the lottery authority can execute.

accounts.name: lottery_state
docs: The main lottery state (to verify authority)

accounts.name: draw_result
docs: The Quick Pick draw result account to be created

accounts.name: payer
docs: The payer for the draw result account creation

instructions.name: finalize_draw
docs: Finalize the Quick Pick draw with winner counts
Called after off-chain indexing determines winner counts.
Handles rolldown distribution: 60% to Match 4, 40% to Match 3.
Advances game state to next draw.
Only the lottery authority can finalize.
* `params` - Winner counts by tier (Match 5, Match 4, Match 3)

accounts.name: lottery_state
docs: The main lottery state (to verify authority)

accounts.name: draw_result
docs: The Quick Pick draw result account to be finalized

instructions.name: force_finalize_draw
docs: Force finalize a Quick Pick draw
Force finalizes a stuck draw with zero winners, allowing the
system to proceed to the next draw. The jackpot carries over.
Only the lottery authority can force finalize.

accounts.name: lottery_state
docs: The main lottery state (to verify authority)

accounts.name: draw_result
docs: The Quick Pick draw result account (if exists)

instructions.name: fund_seed
docs: Fund the Quick Pick Express seed amount
Transfers the seed amount ($5,000) to the prize pool and unpauses the game.
Only the lottery authority can fund.

accounts.name: lottery_state
docs: The main lottery state (to verify authority)

accounts.name: prize_pool_usdc
docs: Quick Pick prize pool USDC token account

instructions.name: initialize
docs: Initialize the Quick Pick Express lottery
Creates the QuickPickState account with game parameters.
Only the main lottery authority can initialize.
The game starts PAUSED and must be funded separately.

accounts.name: lottery_state
docs: The main lottery state (to verify authority)

accounts.name: quick_pick_state
docs: The Quick Pick state account to be created

accounts.name: prize_pool_usdc
docs: Prize pool USDC token account (PDA-controlled by quick_pick_state)

accounts.name: house_fee_usdc
docs: House fee USDC token account (PDA-controlled by quick_pick_state)

accounts.name: insurance_pool_usdc
docs: Insurance pool USDC token account (PDA-controlled by quick_pick_state)

instructions.name: pause
docs: Stops ticket sales and draw execution.
Only the lottery authority can pause.

accounts.name: lottery_state
docs: The main lottery state (to verify authority)

instructions.name: unpause
docs: Resumes ticket sales and draw execution.
Only the lottery authority can unpause.
Requires the jackpot to be funded.

accounts.name: lottery_state
docs: The main lottery state (to verify authority)

instructions.name: update_config
docs: Updates various configuration parameters such as ticket price,
caps, prizes, and draw interval. Can only be called when paused
or no draw is in progress.
* `params` - Configuration parameters to update (None = no change)

accounts.name: lottery_state
docs: The main lottery state (to verify authority)

instructions.name: withdraw_house_fees
docs: Transfers house fees to a destination account.
Only the lottery authority can withdraw.

accounts.name: lottery_state
docs: The main lottery state (to verify authority)

accounts.name: quick_pick_state
docs: The Quick Pick state account (for PDA signing)

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.msg: Unauthorized: caller is not the authority

errors.name: NotTicketOwner
errors.msg: Not the owner of this ticket

errors.name: Paused
errors.msg: Quick Pick Express is currently paused

errors.name: NotInitialized
errors.msg: Quick Pick Express has not been initialized

errors.name: AlreadyInitialized
errors.msg: Quick Pick Express is already initialized

errors.name: InvalidDrawState
errors.msg: Invalid draw state for this operation

errors.name: DrawNotReady
errors.msg: Draw is not ready - draw time not reached

errors.name: InsufficientJackpotFunding
errors.msg: Jackpot is below minimum required amount

errors.name: InvalidNumbers
errors.msg: Invalid numbers: must select 5 unique numbers from 1-35

errors.name: TicketSaleEnded
errors.msg: Ticket sale has ended for this draw

errors.name: AlreadyClaimed
errors.msg: This ticket has already been claimed

errors.name: TicketExpired
errors.msg: This ticket has expired and can no longer be claimed

errors.name: NumbersNotSorted
errors.msg: Numbers must be sorted in ascending order

errors.name: InsufficientMainLotterySpend
errors.msg: Insufficient main lottery spend: $50 lifetime spend required

errors.name: InsufficientPrizePool
errors.msg: Insufficient prize pool balance to pay prize

errors.name: NoPrizeToClaim
errors.msg: No prize to claim for this ticket

errors.name: RandomnessAlreadyRevealed
errors.msg: Randomness has already been revealed - cannot commit

errors.name: RandomnessNotResolved
errors.msg: Randomness has not been resolved yet

errors.name: RandomnessExpired
errors.msg: Randomness has expired - request new randomness

errors.name: RandomnessNotCommitted
errors.msg: Randomness has not been committed yet

errors.name: RandomnessParseError
errors.msg: Failed to parse randomness account data

errors.name: TokenAccountOwnerMismatch
errors.msg: Token account owner does not match expected owner

errors.name: WinnerCountsExceedTickets
errors.msg: Winner counts exceed total tickets sold

types.name: BuyQuickPickTicketParams
docs: Parameters for buying a Quick Pick ticket

types.name: FinalizeQuickPickDrawParams
docs: Parameters for finalizing the Quick Pick draw

fields.name: winner_counts
docs: Winner counts by tier (Match 5, Match 4, Match 3)

fields.name: verification_hash
docs: Verification hash: SHA256(draw_id || winning_numbers || match_5 || match_4 || match_3 || indexer_nonce)
This serves as a commitment to the off-chain winner data, enabling post-hoc auditing.
Off-chain indexers must publish the preimage so anyone can verify the hash on-chain.

fields.name: indexer_nonce
docs: Nonce used by the indexer when computing the verification hash (for replay protection)

types.name: InitializeQuickPickParams
docs: Parameters for initializing Quick Pick Express

fields.name: first_draw_timestamp
docs: First draw timestamp (optional, defaults to now + draw_interval)

types.name: LotteryState
docs: Main lottery state structure (for reference - actual account lives in main lottery)
This structure is used to verify authority for Quick Pick operations.
The actual LotteryState account is owned by the main lottery program.

types.name: QuickPickDrawCancelled
docs: Emitted when a Quick Pick draw is cancelled

types.name: QuickPickDrawExecuted
docs: Emitted when a Quick Pick draw is executed (winning numbers revealed)

fields.name: was_rolldown
docs: Whether this was a rolldown draw

types.name: QuickPickDrawFinalized
docs: Emitted when a Quick Pick draw is finalized with winner counts

types.name: QuickPickDrawForceFinalized
docs: Emitted when a Quick Pick draw is force finalized (emergency)

fields.name: draw_id
docs: Draw ID that was force finalized

types.name: QuickPickDrawResult
docs: Quick Pick Express draw result (5/35 Matrix)
Stores the results of a completed draw including winning numbers,

fields.name: total_tickets
docs: Total tickets sold for this draw

fields.name: was_rolldown
docs: Whether this was a rolldown draw

fields.name: match_5_prize_per_winner
docs: Prize amounts per winner by tier (set during finalization)

fields.name: is_explicitly_finalized
docs: Explicit flag set when draw is finalized

fields.name: draw_id
docs: Draw ID at time of transfer

types.name: QuickPickFeeTierChanged
docs: Emitted when Quick Pick house fee tier changes

fields.name: jackpot_balance
docs: Current jackpot balance that triggered the change

types.name: QuickPickFundSource
docs: Source of funds for emergency transfer

types.name: QuickPickHardCapReached
docs: Emitted when Quick Pick hard cap is reached (forced rolldown)

types.name: QuickPickHouseFeesWithdrawn
docs: Emitted when house fees are withdrawn

types.name: QuickPickInitialized
docs: Emitted when Quick Pick Express is initialized

types.name: QuickPickJackpotWon
docs: Emitted when the Quick Pick jackpot is won

types.name: QuickPickPaused
docs: Emitted when Quick Pick is paused

types.name: QuickPickPrizeClaimed
docs: Emitted when a Quick Pick prize is claimed

types.name: QuickPickRandomnessCommitted
docs: Emitted when Quick Pick randomness is committed

types.name: QuickPickRolldownExecuted
docs: Emitted when a rolldown is executed

types.name: QuickPickSeeded
docs: Emitted when Quick Pick seed is funded

types.name: QuickPickSoftCapReached
docs: Emitted when Quick Pick soft cap is reached

types.name: QuickPickState
docs: Quick Pick Express game state (5/35 Matrix with Rolldown Exploit)
This is the main state account that stores all global configuration
and current state for the Quick Pick Express lottery.

fields.name: house_fee_bps
docs: Current house fee in basis points (dynamic based on jackpot level, 28-38%)

fields.name: jackpot_balance
docs: Jackpot balance in USDC lamports (accumulates between draws)

fields.name: soft_cap
docs: Jackpot soft cap in USDC lamports ($30,000 - probabilistic rolldown begins)

fields.name: hard_cap
docs: Jackpot hard cap in USDC lamports ($50,000 - forced rolldown)

fields.name: seed_amount
docs: Seed amount for jackpot reset after rolldown ($5,000)

fields.name: prize_pool_balance
docs: Prize pool balance for fixed prizes (USDC lamports)

fields.name: reserve_balance
docs: Reserve balance for jackpot seeding (USDC lamports)

fields.name: total_tickets_sold
docs: Total tickets sold across all draws

fields.name: current_randomness_account
docs: Current randomness account for commit-reveal pattern

fields.name: is_draw_in_progress
docs: Is a draw currently in progress (between commit and finalize)

fields.name: is_rolldown_pending
docs: Rolldown pending flag (set when jackpot >= soft_cap)

fields.name: is_funded
docs: Is the lottery funded (seed amount deposited)

types.name: QuickPickTicket
docs: Represents a single ticket purchased by a player for a specific draw.

fields.name: draw_id
docs: Draw ID this ticket is for

fields.name: numbers
docs: Selected numbers (5 numbers from 1-35, stored sorted ascending)

fields.name: is_claimed
docs: Whether the ticket has been claimed

fields.name: match_count
docs: Number of matching numbers (0-5, set after draw)

fields.name: prize_amount
docs: Prize amount in USDC lamports (set after claim)

types.name: QuickPickTicketPurchased
docs: Emitted when a Quick Pick ticket is purchased

fields.name: draw_id
docs: Draw ID the ticket is for

types.name: QuickPickUnpaused
docs: Emitted when Quick Pick is unpaused

types.name: UpdateQuickPickConfigParams
docs: Parameters for updating Quick Pick configuration
